title: The 15 best serviced apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

placeMetadata.name: Riverside Serviced Apartments

sources.snippet: The name of the apartment complex should give you an idea of the spectacular views of the Saigon River from your own balcony. Located at An Phu, Thao Dien Ward, District 2, the serviced apartments are a blend of the best features of both an apartment and a hotel. The residential complex also include the Blu Bar & Grill, a playground, fitness centre, gardens, a salon, tennis courts, shops, and the Riverside Community.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Apartment Estates to Live in Ho Chi Minh

sources.snippet: Located on the scenic Saigon River, the 4-star Riverside Serviced Apartments offers free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and 2 tennis courts. Free scheduled shuttle boat or bus transfers will take you to and from Bach Dang Harbor. Set in 13 buildings, air-conditioned apartments come with a living room and fully equipped kitchen.
sources.shortName: Top 5 best serviced apartment for rent in Ho Chi Minh city

sources.snippet: There are one-, two-, three-, four-, and five-bedroom units depending on how many people you want to accommodate and a 24-hour service from the friendly crew. Visit Riverside Serviced Apartments at 53 Vo Truong Toan at District 2.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Serviced Apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

placeMetadata.generatedDescription: Riverside Serviced Apartments, located in An Phu, Thao Dien Ward, District 2, offers stunning views of the Saigon River from its balconies. This 4-star complex features an outdoor pool, two tennis courts, and free Wi-Fi. The apartments are air-conditioned with fully equipped kitchens and living rooms. The property also includes a playground, fitness center, gardens, salon, shops and the Blu Bar & Grill.
placeMetadata.address: 53 V√µ Tr∆∞·ªùng To·∫£n, P, Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh 700000, Vietnam

reviews.reviewText:
Riverside has been my home for the last 2 years. This unique spot offers short and long term accomodation right by beautiful Saigon River.
Settled in a lush garden, with chirping birds and very special light is a perfect spot to relax outside of the busy city and to take mesmerizing pictures.
The management is very friendly and helpful beyond expectations.
Last but not least: the swimming pool and the river boat make this place a true gem in Saigon.

Riverside serviced apartments is a resort within the bustling city! Super nice pool and restaurant with fantastic views over the Saigon River! Great security and facilities. Also very close to restaurants and great boat service into District 1. Great value!

My 5th time staying at this lovely residence / apartment facility.  The staff are always super helpful, the public areas are clean and tidy, the addition of lovely pool and restaurant it has all the ingredients for a wonderful stay.

Great location, great people and excellent value for money üëç

A wonderful place for a short or long stay. The apartments are spacious, clean and practical. The facilities are great, particularly if you have children. The restaurant by the river is fantastic, but also great bars and restaurants around. And an incredibly helpful and friendly staff!

I stayed here with my 2 kids for a few nights. The place is enjoyable, peaceful and convenient with hammock, coconut trees, bamboo, free laundry, play-yard for kids, pets area... There are optional boat trips to go along Saigon River. It's worth every penny.

Love the location and the park like atmosphere with a real feeling of community.

I hear the apartments are huge... and it is right on the river... such a peaceful pretty location. wonderful playground great for kids, dog run, tennis courts, all very nice...

Pierre the Manager of the Complex is just a nice, thoughtful man.

Stayed for a week for a business trip (client's location was within 1 km ) so didn't expect much - but left quite happy with the place.

1. Quiet -it is a residential area so I was surprised the place was still pretty quiet and relaxed,
2. Location and view - wonderful view of the river, taxis easy to get, and can walk (if you dare cross the highway on foot!!!! - that was an experience in itself)
3. Nice restaurant within the compound
4. Complete amenities for the easy traveller - laundry, food, minishop, tennis/basketball court/gym, coffee shop, tennis instructors, swimming pool
5. Rooms were decent and fairly large (I was alone but I can imagine the my suite able to take 4 people quite easily)
6. Internet everywhere.
7.  Price is quite reasonable.
8. Not quite HCMC center but taxis are quite affordable.
9 . Staff quite helpful (and very polite)

Overall, pretty happy with my stay. And I will surely try to come back if I want some R&R.

Low rise blocks of large tasteful apartments surrounded by well groomed gardens. Blu restaurant expensive compared to city places but good international selection in generous portions. Meal & a drink about 200,000VND.
A perfect spot having spent a couple  of days staying in the centre of town. Lovely very welcomed pool area and courtesy bus/boat back into city centre. Free use of washing machines & driers also a bonus. Coffee shop very good and mini mart with limited food selection. We are enjoying our stay very much

placeMetadata.name: Homestead Parkview

sources.snippet: Another award-winning apartment in Ho Chi Minh City, Homestead Parkview is all you need for fully-serviced apartments at competitive rates. Reserve now and book one of their units such as luxury apartment, studio, deluxe apartment, deluxe king suite, family two-bedroom suite, two-bedroom apartment, and executive room.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Serviced Apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

sources.snippet: Strategically located in the city center, Homestead Parkview offers homely and modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access throughout the property. It features a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Rooms are fitted with a kitchen with amenities such as a fridge, hob, baking oven and electric kettle
sources.shortName: Top 5 best serviced apartment for rent in Ho Chi Minh city

placeMetadata.description: Straightforward hotel featuring informal quarters, plus a restaurant & a rooftop terrace.
placeMetadata.generatedDescription: Homestead Parkview is a straightforward hotel with informal accommodations, a restaurant, and a rooftop terrace. The property offers beautiful views of Tao Dan Park and provides various neatly designed apartments suitable for families and business travelers. It is known for its fully-serviced apartments at competitive rates, including luxury, studio, deluxe, family two-bedroom suites, and executive rooms. The hotel's location is convenient, close to boutique shops and eateries within walking distance of Ben Thanh Market.

reviews.reviewText: Nice hotel staff was very friendly and helpful in giving directions for city. Hotel is very centrally located and on a quiet street. Breakfast was really good too. Enjoyed stay and ended up booking extra night.

The hotel is shut down, power and phone bill unpaid. Do not come here. My husband and our two young sons were left stranded on the phone for 2 hours to rearrange accomodation during the busy period, we had to stay in the city away from the tourist area that we wanted to stay. We were stuck from 9pm - 11pm in a dodgy area. As we waited people approached us and it felt unsafe. They allow people to book their room even though they are closed.

reviews.reviewerName: Himalayan Eco Cultural Tours and Travels
reviews.reviewText:
Very nice and clean hotel! Staffs are also very nice!

There is a school next to the hotel, so if you are not the early bird , and likes to sleep late in the morning, the school kids noise will disturb your sleep!

Talking about breakfast, I really enjoyed their breakfast! And being vegetarian I must say they have quite decent options for vegetarian too!

Restaurant staff and receptionist were nice!

We booked the apartment with 2 separate bedrooms, 2 toilets (one with bathtub)  and a living room and kitchen.
The master bedroom is big and comfortable. However the same cannot be said for the smaller bedroom. It is much smaller and you cannot close and lock the door. Also there are small holes for decoration in the wall which faces the living room so there is no privacy.
Keep that in mind before taking the smaller bedroom
The breakfast is ordinary and the service is slow. I don't like the system where you have to order the food and then it comes to you. A simple buffet where all the options are available  is much better and simpler. Also the food from the √† la carte menu took a lot of time
Location is good and is close to the Ben Th√†nh market.

We spent over a week here, great rooms for the price, comfy beds, stocked fridge, quick laundry service. The only complaint is the lack of water pressure and hot water when showering on higher floors. Would stay here for a shorter stay again!

Been coming here for years but things don‚Äôt improve though the prices increase.. Internet is so slow it‚Äôs almost worthless. Want a dining table where the dining table is supposed to be? The staff has got to steal one from an unoccupied room. Want a privacy curtain? Ditto. Or a second lamp for the second bedside table? Same. The owner seems to just refuse to spend any money on fixing these basic things. And somehow they‚Äôre rated as a 4-star hotel?!?

Hotel location is good, near small boutique shops & eatery. Walking distance to Ben Thanh Market. Hotel rooms need further upgrade as certain facilities are rather old & infested with ants. The hotel staffs are very responsive & helpful & a handful of them can speak simple English, namely Johnny, the front office helper & the young slim fit man helping out in the restaurant at level one. Generally, the front office & restaurant staffs are very polite, good & ready to serve. Johnny specifically helped to change my room after the first night to a brighter & cleaner room. He is attentive & can recognise me when I stepped into the hotel as this is the 3rd time staying in this same hotel. The restaurant at level one is newly renovated, i supposed as previously the breakfast was served at the hugest floor.

The place is not a 4 star and it is difficult to get 2 rooms of the same category on the same floor and will be asked to upgrade . The hotel is getting old and needs a refurbished work. The hot water takes 2 mins in the taps.
Most of the team members can connect in English.
The staff are helpful too .
There is no swimming pool , bar or dedicated support staff for luggage or misc  .
The stairs are high ...10 stairs .so could be difficult with big suitcases.
The breakfast  buffet was dull , but the main attendant was prompt to get a option for us .
So vegetarian people do ask and get the extra care.
Overall it's a average.

placeMetadata.name: Somerset Ho Chi Minh City

sources.snippet: Each apartment has a kitchen, home entertainment system, free broadband internet access and a work desk. Conveniently located in the commercial and shopping district, Somerset Ho Chi Minh City offers serviced apartment in Ho Chi Minh city with free high-speed internet access and an outdoor pool with spa bath. Each apartment has a kitchen, home entertainment system, free broadband internet access and a work desk.
sources.shortName: Top 5 best serviced apartment for rent in Ho Chi Minh city

sources.snippet: One of the best accommodations in Ho Chi Minh City, Somerset is located at No. 8A Nguyen Binh Khiem St. at District 1. You can choose from a number of apartment types such as one-bedroom deluxe, two-bedroom executive, two-bedroom executive suite, two-bedroom premier, three-bedroom executive, three-bedroom executive suite, and three-bedroom premier.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Serviced Apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

placeMetadata.description: Polished units with kitchens in a relaxed apartment hotel with an outdoor pool & a gym.
placeMetadata.generatedDescription: Somerset Ho Chi Minh City is a relaxed apartment hotel located in the commercial and shopping district of Ho Chi Minh City. The polished units feature kitchens, home entertainment systems, free broadband internet access, and work desks. The property offers an outdoor pool with a spa bath and a gym for guests to enjoy. It's known for its spacious serviced apartments that cater to both tourists and expats, providing comfort and ample space for relaxation.

reviews.reviewText:
We had an absolutely wonderful stay at Somerset Ho Chi Minh City! From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel so welcome and comfortable. The room was immaculate‚Äîspotlessly clean and equipped with all the amenities needed for a truly relaxing stay.

The location was ideal, conveniently close to everything we wanted to explore. The buffet breakfast was delicious, with a wide variety of options to start the day perfectly. The pool was fantastic as well‚Äîa great spot to relax and unwind.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend Somerset Ho Chi Minh City to anyone visiting the area. A heartfelt thank you to the entire team for making our experience so memorable!

Myself and 2 friends booked The Somerset for the month of February  mainly to escape the cold month at home in Scotland. We had a lovely 3 bedroom apartment. There was a very well fitted kitchen and a spacious dining/livingroom an en suite bathroom in one of the bedrooms a separate shower room and also a small toilet with wash basin and shower. We had a washing machine and had rails to hang washing out on balcony to dry. It really was a "home from home". The pool area was very clean and well looked after with plenty sun loungers. We made use of the gym which was well equipped. The staff were polite and friendly and really happy to help with any requests we had. We had an amazing month and would love to return again sometime.

Excellent stay, thank you.

Stayed here for 2 nights in March 2025 before flying to Phu Quoc.

The rooms are beautiful, very clean, Fully fitted kitchen, bedrooms very comfortable, lovely spotless bathrooms.
Food was delicious, tasty and very reasonably priced.
The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.

The swimming pool was beautiful and a welcome from the heat of HCMC.

Highly recommend

Central location - would have been easy to get around if not for the Liberation Day prep two weekends beforehand‚Ä¶resulted in the roads being closed so it was hard to get a Grab. The hotel and property itself was nicely maintained and all staff were wonderful and friendly. We stayed in the 3 bedroom suite and appreciated having a washer and dryer and the complimentary water and instant ramen! The front desk and reception staff is truly so accommodating and made our stay comfortable. There is a convenience store onsite that's convenient. The hotel hosted an Easter egg hunt when we were visiting - my son enjoyed and and it was such a nice touch!

stayed for two nights the staff are super nice the people at the door and in the lobby are so respectful and kind. The breakfast was okay definitely could be better but to some people it may be good. rooms were amazing very spacious and big. overall good place to stay nice staff though the location is some distance to the main parts of the city.

These serviced apartments are astonishingly well priced. We had a two-bedroom apartment, which measured about 85 square metres. It had two bathrooms and was equipped for long-term use, with oven, hob, washing machine and full-size fridge-freezer. All the appliances were very good quality. Although the pool had a shallow end, you could still swim laps. For me, location isn't such a critical factor as it is in, say, Bangkok since it is very easy to move around the city with Grab. You never have to wait more than two minutes for a ride anywhere. We only ate at the restaurant once and, as mentioned by many reviewers, found it to be substandard. Given the number of options in the vicinity I would not consider that a deal breaker. I would thoroughly recommend these serviced apartments.

As a father of three, I am always thinking about safety and health for my kids.  The main reason for my low rating is the service and food at the hotel restaurant.  Please note that on the night of the bad experience we had there was a party, sponsored by the hotel.  We could not attend as there was no table for us and they claimed to be full.

We went to the hotel restaurant and ordered 4 different dishes.  Total time before first plate arrived was 1 hour 20 minutes.  My wife, speaking fluent Vietnamese asked them to prepare the food with no spice or anything spicy.  I took one bite of the food and had to stop eating any more.  It was too spicy and one bite started making my stomach sick.  The additional dishes were bought out at 1 hour 30 minutes and the last dish was never brought out.

When I brought my concerns to the wait staff, we had to argue to remove the food we never received and still had to pay for the spicy dish.

It‚Äôs not the money, it‚Äôs the principle of it all.  If they could not serve us because of the event, they should have told us to begin with.  Then, not taking ownership of their bad service made matters worse.

All the hotel can offer is good will and they let us down.  No reason to patronize them, so we cancelled the remainder of our trip with them and found a larger apartment at less cost in D4.

We recently had the pleasure of staying 3 nites at this well maintained, lovely apartment.
The staff at the reception were friendly, helpful and we were being served by Vivien who did the check in for us, and we were glad that we had the privilege to meet Vivien again who handle our check out. Vivien was very efficient, friendly and accommodating which made us feel at ease, welcome and comfortable.

Room was clean, firm mattress which gave restful night sleep, kitchen well fitted, bathroom clean well maintained.

We called for room service once, had the pho which tasted flavoursome, there is also a convenient shop located on site.

We enjoyed our stayed and would recommend it to our friends and others.

placeMetadata.name: A&EM Hotel & Spa

sources.snippet: Located near the Ben Thanh Street Food Market, Fine Arts Museum, General Science Library, Reunification Palace, Benh Thanh Market, Notre Dame Church, and many more, the apartments are the best place to stay if you have an adventurous spirit. Travel experts consider it one of the best locations in Ho Chi Minh City to stay, and the units include perks such as free WiFi and a fully-fitted kitchen and entertainment set. With additional charges, guests can also enjoy massage and spa services and access to the wellness center.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Apartment Estates to Live in Ho Chi Minh

sources.snippet: This four-star hotel and apartment is located at 59-61 Thu Koan Huan Street in District 1, you are guaranteed the best service at the heart of Ho Chi Minh City. A&Em Hotel and Apartments include fully-furnished units, restaurant, wellness center, spa, fitness center, massage services, outdoor swimming pool, and airport shuttle services.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Serviced Apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

placeMetadata.description: Polished rooms in a chic property featuring dining, a spa & a cafe/bar, plus free Wi-Fi.
placeMetadata.generatedDescription: A&EM Hotel & Spa is a stylish property offering well-appointed rooms, dining options, and a spa. Situated near popular attractions like Ben Thanh Street Food Market and Reunification Palace, it's an ideal choice for adventurous travelers. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi, fully-equipped kitchens in the units, and entertainment sets. Guests can also access massage and spa services at an additional cost.

reviews.reviewText:
Kudos to the staff especially the male receptionst Mr. Hieu, the doorman (sorry didnt catch his name) as well as the lady cleaner. They were all welcoming and cheerful despite working hard through out the day.

Mr. Hieu, from day 1, treated us with the best service. He even gave his personal number to me so that I can contact him if I have any issues. Never once in my stays, even in 5 star hotels, have the staff reached out to me and connected with clients to this extent.

With respect to rooms, they were reasonable for the price. Cleanliness wise, I am pretty impressed with the lady cleaner on how my room is always in top condition everytime I return back after my breakfast. The beds were so comfortable and they are generous with the pillows in the room as well. The best part of security of the room will be the buzzer noise that indicates that you haven't closed the room door properly.

Overall, I had a fantastic stay at this hotel and no doubt I will be returning to stay here again given the professionalism of the staff. It still warms my heart on how the staff made me feel like the hotel was my second home and a safe place.

Side note: When I return next time, I will definately want to bring the entire team who assisted me for dinner

Keep up the good work guys and see you again‚ò∫Ô∏è

Rooms is new and clean, location is not bad... near banh thah market...

Wanted late check out timing but was told room was fully booked thus unable to accommodate. However, when I wanted to pay for half day use, it was available. Not very honest I will say

Paid and get on with it.

I‚Äôm Vietnamese. Living in Australia.
I been stayed in A& em Group seen 2012 for at least minimum 1 time/ year( accepted during Covid times).
this time I stayed for 11 nights. But, they changed 3 times for my room. I end up to stayed in the room with:
- The room on the top level of the hotel :only my room, the fitness & hotel stores
- Very very hot
- the electric turned off in the middle of the night till next morning
- the bathroom have waters all over on the floor when i have showered
- the door can‚Äôt locked when I‚Äôm inside the room üò£üò£üò£
- when I asked to fixed the problem: the accountant lady ( her name: Oanh) & Receptionist man( his name: Sang). Both answer my request super Rude.Special the accountant lady, that is not her responsibility, but her actions really really ridiculous. She act like she is the owner of the hotelü§¨ü§¨ü§¨
- I stayed 11 nights, but they didn‚Äôt changed my bed sheets. üò¢üò¢üò¢.
- the television not clear to watching.. event that the Vietnamese chanelü§Øü§Øü§Ø

The only Best thing in this hotel is : Breakfast. Although, I‚Äôm not have Breakfast every day when I‚Äôm in there, but the lady ( her name: Phuong-work in there every day ) she Super Friendly.& the Foods really really nice.

Super super angry! I don‚Äôt think I will come back here again in future!

It's in a convenient location and close to many points of interest by foot if you don't mind walking. The cleaning staff tend to get together in the morning and have their breakfast and chat on the floor. They don't have any other place to congregate I suppose so their talking and walkie talkie chatter will take you up between 8am to 9am. The shower is very low so if you're tall then you'll just need to hold the handle. Very small bathroom but it is clean. You can find cheaper and better accommodation if you look.

Split between a road, there are 2 A&EM. Depending on which you spent the night, one will need to head to another building for breakfast. And that's where it disappoints. For the price of 1.7 million/night, the breakfast was below par. Cafe was very small which made dining not comfortable.

On November 2018, February 2019 and August 2019 I booked reservations at A&EM Corner Hotel. From the moment I arrived I was  pleased at the warm welcome I received from the staff at the front desk. I was taken to my room  and noticed right away how clean the room and the toilet area was. I cannot say enough for the house cleaning department.  Binh Nguyen who cleaned my room and was very polite and greeted me with a warm welcome . Her smile and pleasant personality sets her above all others. A&EM Hotel is very lucky to have a wonderful employee like Binh Nguyen

Hotel is in good location, convenient to visit several tourist places and room condition is acceptable.
However, I am sorry to say that the breakfast is not tasty. And the thing made me really disappointed is internet quality. I was in business trip and internet working was necessary but the connection was always lost. My colleges got the same terrible situation.
In considering above issues, I think the room price is high.
Great location in district 1. Very lively area and walkable. Ben Thanh is very close by. Room was spacious with jacuzzi in toilet.

placeMetadata.name: JW Marriott Hotel & Suites Saigon (Apartment Tower)

placeMetadata.description: Sleek units with kitchens & city views in an upscale apartment hotel offering a pool & a gym.
placeMetadata.generatedDescription: InterContinental Saigon Residences, an IHG Hotel, offers sleek units with kitchens and city views in an upscale apartment hotel. The property features a pool and a gym for guests to enjoy. Additionally, the hotel is centrally located near famous architectural complexes of old Saigon from the French colonial period, such as Notre Dame Cathedral, Saigon Post Office, and the Independence Palace.

reviews.reviewText:
Exceptional Stay with Outstanding Service and Birthday Surprises

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the InterContinental Saigon Residences, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I arrived, the hospitality was top-notch. A special shoutout to Sabrina and her amazing team who truly went above and beyond to make my stay exceptional.

I was delighted to receive a complimentary upgrade, which made my stay even more comfortable. The residence itself was beautifully appointed, offering all the amenities one could ask for. The attention to detail in the room was impeccable, making it feel like a home away from home.

What really made my stay special was the thoughtful birthday amenity I received. It was a wonderful surprise that made my birthday even more memorable. Additionally, the team was incredibly accommodating by offering a late checkout, allowing me to enjoy the property just a little bit longer.

Overall, the InterContinental Saigon Residences exceeded my expectations in every way. The service was impeccable, the accommodations luxurious, and the little personal touches made all the difference. I can‚Äôt thank Sabrina and her team enough for making my stay so special. I highly recommend this property to anyone looking for an exceptional experience in Saigon.

Exceptional service, room, facilities.
The executive lounge is superb. Breakfast is fab.
The staff if very nice and helpful.
Location is very central and at walking distance from main tourist spots.
Loved my stay.

I am staying with Intercontinental residences & has a mixed experience. On the positive side, the apartment is spacious and well-furnished, making it a comfortable stay for us. The housekeeping service was also good and attentive.

However, I an disappointed with a few aspects. Despite the high rent, the hotel does not provide basic amenities like water, detergents , dish ckeaner, and washroom accessories. Instead, they expect you to buy these essentials from outside, which I found unreasonable.

Additionally, the hotel has a very strict visitor policy, which was inconvenient for us. The apartments, although spacious, felt more like hotel rooms.

Overall, while residence has its positives, the drawbacks left a sour taste. If they could revisit their policies and provide basic amenities, I would consider staying here again.
The Apartment has a lot of space for my family of 5, breakfast is great. Definately recommend the apartment part of the hotel for family travel!!!

Great hotel with great staff a must stay with the family!
They were attentive and helpful. My kids got sick and the manager personally walked up to my room help me get the medication I needed from the Vietnamese app. We are vegetarian so they definitely made a great effort every day to provide us food.  Duy in the breakfast buffet area was fantastic-He was attentive and made sure we all had what we needed. He also sometimes sent out take away coffees with us! Highly recommend the hotel

Excellent hotel. Love the super comfy bed and pillow. Very clean. Big toilet with bath tub and shower area. Love their staff from porter, concierge to housekeeping and counter staff. Excellent gym. 9/10 rating. Will return to stay again. Breakfast can be better to have more variety and toilet should have shelve in shower room and extra tissue box on the desk.

Amazing staff - they do everything to make sure you feel like you are at a five star luxury residence. We were thee for New Year and saw the fireworks from our balcony. Even though fully packed, felt they knew every detail. Even the breakfast buffet is a harmony of working parts during peak times. I don't have the slightest bad thing to say during my four day stay. Location is near great food, tourist sites and a mall. The front desk was so accommodating. We are definitely staying here again soon.

Staying here as I review, we have a two bedroom apartment on the 18th floor. Great room. Breakfast is really great. There‚Äôs some extra restaurants and a wee shop part of the building which is hand as. Pools are good for the kids, a very shallow one and the other 1.4m deep end. Gym is great with good treadmills. üòâ

placeMetadata.name: Sherwood Residence

sources.snippet: Conveniently located at 127 Pasteur Street in District 3 of Saigon, Sherwood Residence boasts of spacious, quality, and fully-furnished units for you and your family. The five-star services and accommodation include a choice between a three-bedroom or a two-bedroom serviced penthouses or apartments.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Serviced Apartments in Ho Chi Minh City

placeMetadata.description: Warm apartments in a polished hotel offering a pool, dining & a free local shuttle, plus a gym.
placeMetadata.generatedDescription: Sherwood Residence is a luxury serviced apartments in District 3 of Ho Chi Minh City. It offers all the amenities families need for a great stay, such as a pool, kids playroom and cinema. The property is located just a 25-minute walk from the large 'Ben Thanh Market'.

reviews.reviewText:
It was among the best stays ever!

We stayed at the Majestic Presidential Suite in Saigon and the JW Marriott luxury suite in Dubai, so we have some reference points.
...
This three-bedroom apartment, while not as luxurious, won our satisfaction in other aspects with its immense space and superior location.

We loved the staff here, from the reception desk to the cleaning staff to the security staff. Everyone made our five-night stay easy, welcoming, and comfortable.

Here are highlights:
* Very clean and spacious
* Friendly and professional staff
* Facilities such as a fully functional kitchen, washer, dryer, and refrigerator are all top-quality
* Water pressure and temperature are very satisfactory
* Elevators are very fast and clean
* Daily cleanings were superb

We'd love to stay here again.

We enjoyed our stay here, especially the large suites to accommodate our large group (and laundry in each suite). The pool was great, and we enjoyed the breakfast buffet one day. They are a little particular about room keys and towels in a way that reminds us we are not in a fancy hotel, but overall I was very happy with our experience and we would definitely stay here again.

Our final hotel at the end of a month travelling with my wife down from Hanoi, and one of our favourites! Huge 3 bed apartment. Acres of space. Lovely pool for the hot afternoons. Gym, games rooms, even a guest cinema room ! The staff are incredibly helpful. Breakfast is very good. We also had a few lunches which were great as well. Very central location near to the War Remnants museum, Independence Palace, cathedral etc. Perfect for families. My teenager & friend on their gap years joined us here for a few days and were delighted to find the apartment had a washing machine and tumble drier. Very good value for money. A bit of noise from the ubiquitous karaoke bars but you are in a big city, and our apartment had double-double glazing which helped.

Would love to be able to rate even higher! Location is excellent- rooms are quiet, coop supermarket around the corner, great facilities, lovely pool, and very clean and comfortable rooms. Convenient location to be able to get good food and explore. Lovely staff

My friends and I stayed here from May 18-31 with a three bed rooms executive. The hotel staff was very friendly, helpful, and accommodating our needs. The hotel was very clean, nice, and modern. Definitely we will stay here again if we come back to Saigon. People complains for almost everything but we are happy with this hotel.

Very happy with my stay at this time place. Apartment was huge, more than spacious enough for my family of 5 - 3 separate bedrooms (1 king, 2 singles and 1 twin), 2 big bathrooms, huge living room and a fully furnished kitchen. Nice swimming pool and fitness. There is an entertainment area too. Breakfast good - fruits selection can be improved though. Location - within walking distance to Independance palace, Ben Than market, Opera House and Cathedral. Not far from airport. Great price to quality ratio. Would definitely consider staying again.

reviews.reviewText: Rooms are very clean. Place close to everything. The arrangement of rooms in the appartment is logical. Beds are comfy which helped me sleep well after an 8 hours flight. Reception and service is excellent. I already booked to stay here another two times in Vietnam for March and December this year. Just to show how much I like this place. Keep up with your good work Sherwood Residence!

Hotel is well maintained throughout, rooms are comfortable, clean and spacious, comes with kitchen and laundry (very handy). Pool is refreshing after a long day of walking and site seeing, lots of activities for kids- billiards, table tennis, games room, yoga room. Buffet breakfast was also good but would have loved to see more Vietnamese options.  Staff were professional and helpful during our stay.

reviews.reviewText: I was very happy with the room, so clean and spacious. The host was lovely, she really took care of the client. Would definitely recommended.

Location was good. Price was ok.
2br apartment was clean, but weirdly designed.  A bedroom in a round glass room in the lounge room, and shower over the toilet.
Very minimal interaction with any staff. So can't say anything on that.
Need security to give you access to the roof top pool. So you have to come down to reception, then go up again. Pool doesnt look all that used. The rooftop bar was closed and looks like it has been for a long time.
And these 2 items were the reason for booking this place.
I'd probably look at another place if you want to have a drink by the pool while kids have a swim.

Made the reservation through booking.com, everything was confirmed and I also had contact with the owner through chat.
Upon arrival i was told that the room was not ready yet and that I had to wait one hour. I waited over 2 and a half hours, but still no room. I wasn't offered and alternatieve, so I left and had to book a room somewhere else. Now the owner acuses me saying that I refused the room that she offered, that is simply not true. I was not offered a room. After traveling for 26 hours I would have accepted any place where I could sleep. I spoke to 3 more people while I was there, and they had the same problem. I would stay away from this place.
Useless, will not answer phone to confirm booking. You get a different room than what you pay for. Sometimes you even get directed to a different location not near the tourist area. Stay away.

Beware, this apartment is owned by various tenants and each tenant is using all kinds of room booking websites to have the customers.

There is no way to get your room cleaned, old filthy furnitures and shower booth are covered by stains.

This was the biggest waste of money ever.

We booked one of the apartment 2 bedroom on level 16. When we checked in we noticed that one of the bathroom have blocked drainage. We reported to receptionist and was told that there will be plumber coming to fix the next day, but no one show up. Because of the water doesn't drain causing the bedroom smell like a rubbish bin. Disgusting!!! I have to sleep on the couch cause I couldn't stand the smell. Would not recommend this place. And will never come back to this place.

PROs: large rooms with full kitchen and a nice view (if you get one of the higher floors). Rooftop pool and view also very great.

CONs: our room had ants in the kitchen on the 12th floor, can't imagine how bad the lower floors are. Not very English friendly. 2/3 of our washroom lights were burnt out and when I went to ask they said to ask the next day, which should have been  caught when they cleaned the room (so did they even clean it or did they just make up the beds?)

Conclusion: we only took the room for a place to sleep for 2 nights for a decent price. If you are planning a longer trip I do not recommend this place.

Interior is the same as pictures. Unfortunately, noise from the street can be heard clearly in room on the 5th floor. It is noisier in the living area. Luckily, I could sleep with earplugs as the bedroom has better noise insulation. Glass partition and door between living room and bedroom. A futon is placed in the living room.

reviews.reviewText: Best place to live in HO CHI MINH city

This is a decent, cheap place to stay if you‚Äôre visiting the area. Very safe, located right next to a mall, big rooms. The pool (on floor 3) is stunning.

Now for the not-so-good stuff: the room we stayed in was pretty bare bones although it did have an amazing view and balcony. The beds are hard as rocks, one toilet was temperamental when it came to flushing and there were no extra towels or bedding. You may also not be able to get a key card for each person. Really the biggest issue was the bed, I struggled to sleep in it unless I was drunk üò¨

Lastly, there is a gym (also on floor 3), but it is teeny tiny and not air conditioned.

Management is the worst. They did nothing to protect residents that live around an apartment that has construction ongoing for 2 months. And please do not rent A28.01 (T3). The landlord (i) has absolutely 0 awareness about the fact that his apt construction is causing inconvenience and (ii) doesnt comply with construction policy at all (construction happens even on the weekend). I am very uncertain a landlord like him will honor a lease agreement.

Quite big apartment with balcony
We are having many Customers stay here.
This place is nice & very convinience, and next to Vincom Shopping Center

One of the worst pet policy. I tried to register my dog but they denied and they also fined me 1,000,000 vnd just because I didn't have the dog registered. If I can't register and I can't take it through the lift so then what can I do?

Want to give a big shout out to Receptionist Minh Thy for helping me with an urgent matter today. I dropped my bunch of keys (mail box, main door, room, office keys, etc.) into the gap of the elevator doors. I was feeling helpless as I had no spare keys, won't be around until 10pm at night, and would not be able to enter my apartment. Furthermore, elevator maintenance period was only slated to be a couple of days later.

Minh Thy understood the emergency and alongside building management, helped to coordinate with lift maintenance crew to retrieve my keys. I am beyond thankful that she dispelled my worries! I didn't have to call a 24/7 locksmith too.

Place is surely convenient to many locations (Brownie point is the Vincom mall). If you are lucky enough to have good neighbors it‚Äôs a good place to say if not would be a nightmare with the disturbances. The pool is decent but you can not list the gym as a amenity since it's pretty disappointing. What I like the most is the staff, very humble and helpful.

Been living here since February 2019. We feel pretty safe here, lots of security at all times. Has a gym and a pool which are well taken care of. Love the location of this Tower in particular compared to the other 4 towers of the complex. Overall, very nice apartment complex in HCMC!

reviews.reviewText: Loved my stay! Spacious room, strong A/C, great water pressure, and fast lift. Service was top-notch, special thanks to Tina at the front desk, super accommodating with the brightest smile (and the cutest dimples!). Tons of street food nearby (mostly Japanese), but Grab or a 5-min walk gets you more variety. Even got a personal welcome email, never had that, not even from 5‚Äì6 star hotels. Impressed!

Had an amazing long weekend stay here, the most commendable factor has to be the customer service staff who are friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Jay who went out of his way to help me post a card even though he has not done it before, I really appreciate that. He is very kind, meticulous and readily offered his assistance. Also the staff who brings up our grabfood orders every time, thank you.

The room layout is great and kept very clean. Because of the national day rehearsals we got to watch the fireworks from our room. Hotel is well located too, walking distance to many things and convenience stores right beside and opposite. 10/10.

I've just stayed there for a long week, and I must say how much I appreciated the staff (hi Irene!). They were very kind, attentive, helpful, often beyond simple good business practice.
The staff was also interacting with me via whatsapp to help in any way they could.
The location is great for visiting the city center (I was here on business, so I didn't do much of this) and is directly across from the Little Tokyo enclave, which has countless japanese restaurants (and bars, if you're into that kind of thing), and walking distance from most city attractions and museums.
My room (a studio) was modern, large, well maintained (aging a bit, but still in perfect condition) and the room staff was discreet and efficient. Comfortable bed and linen, quiet. Good shower.
Breakfast is a changing buffet, with stations where they'll make you vietnamese soups etc. Mix of western and eastern food.
There is a pool in open air on the 10th floor, which I did not use, but it seemed lovely.
Also on the 10th floor you have access to a free laundry, which I used a lot (you'll likely sweat a lot in VN.)
I spent most of my time in district 2 while not working, and using Grab to drive me around was super easy, and quite cheaper than a taxi.
Overall, the Signature M Village Le Thanh Ton deserves my 5 stars.

Located right in the heart of the city, this M Village property offers great convenience for getting around, especially to popular tourist spots. There are also many restaurants nearby, catering to a wide range of budgets. The swimming pool is spacious and beautifully designed, providing a refreshing retreat. The rooms are incredibly spacious and well-equipped, ensuring a comfortable stay. One of the standout features is the room's view, which offers a stunning panoramic view of the city skyline. The staff here are exceptionally friendly and proactive, always ready to assist with any needs. Overall, a fantastic stay that combines convenience, comfort, and exceptional service.

During a recent business trip to Ho Chi Minh City, I had the opportunity to stay at the Signature M Village Hotel. The first impression was the luxurious and professional space right from the reception hall. The staff was enthusiastic, the check-in procedure was smooth - this is very important when the work schedule is tight. The room was clean, modern, fully equipped with a desk, high-speed wifi - very suitable for business needs. The light was good, ensuring a good night's sleep after a stressful day at work. A big plus is the central location in District 1, near office buildings and the airport, making travel much more convenient. In addition, the hotel also supports setting up a pick-up car, which is very convenient.

I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The staff were incredibly friendly and professional, always ready to help and made me feel very welcome. The location is perfect ‚Äî super convenient for exploring nearby attractions. The room was spacious, clean, and well-equipped with everything I needed. What impressed me the most was how helpful the staff were in recommending places to visit ‚Äî their suggestions were absolutely spot-on and really added to my experience. I would definitely come back!

I stayed here for 2 nights, everything was very good and comfortable. The staff at the lobby were very friendly and recommended good restaurants to me. Although the road was closed on holidays, they were still enthusiastic in helping me move around. The room was clean and tidy, the housekeeping staff were cheerful and lovely. I really recommend everyone to come and I will come back on my next stay.

We rented a 1 Bedroom Apartment and we were not close to being disappointed. The room was really clean and modern. The view was wonderful. The staff was really friendly and welcoming. The breakfast buffet was amazing. Easily my favorite hotel in S√†i G√≤n and an easy recommendation for anyone visiting the city and wanting to stay in District 1.

Edited:
After a couple more weeks of reflecting on my stay, Signature by M Village L√™ Th√°nh T√¥n has become my favorite hotel not just in Saigon, but in Vietnam. It's that good. Hopefully, it stays that way until the next time I am able to return.

headerTemplate.blurbTemplate: Are you looking for the best [autocompleteTerm] in [geoNameWithThe]? You‚Äôre not alone! Many of us love traveling on the Wanderlog team, so naturally we‚Äôre always on the hunt to find the most popular spots anytime we travel somewhere new. We‚Äôve looked through different sources to find the best options, including favorites like [examplePlaceNames].
headerTemplate.topBlurb:
Ho Chi Minh City, a vibrant blend of history and modernity, offers a unique experience for travelers seeking comfort and convenience. With its bustling streets, rich culture, and mouthwatering street food, this city is a feast for the senses. Whether you're exploring the historic Ben Thanh Market or enjoying the lively atmosphere at the Ben Thanh Street Food Market, having a cozy place to call home during your stay is essential. That's where serviced apartments come in, providing the perfect balance of luxury and practicality for families and solo travelers alike.

From the upscale Sherwood Residence in District 3, which boasts a pool and kids' playroom, to the stylish A&EM Saigon Hotel, located near popular attractions, there‚Äôs a range of options to suit every traveler's needs. Imagine unwinding after a day of exploration in a spacious apartment with modern amenities, or enjoying a refreshing dip in a rooftop pool with stunning city views. The Wanderlog team is passionate about helping you discover the best places to stay, so you can focus on making unforgettable memories in this dynamic city. Get ready to explore Ho Chi Minh City and find the perfect serviced apartment for your adventure!
